   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(ssl_socket_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   24: 
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: 
   29: %% Callback functions
   30: -export([all/0,
   31:          groups/0,
   32:          init_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_group/2,
   36:          init_per_testcase/2,
   37:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   38: 
   39: %% Testcases
   40: -export([getstat/0,
   41:          getstat/1,
   42:          socket_options/0,
   43:          socket_options/1,
   44:          invalid_inet_get_option/0,
   45:          invalid_inet_get_option/1,
   46:          invalid_inet_get_option_not_list/0,
   47:          invalid_inet_get_option_not_list/1,
   48:          invalid_inet_get_option_improper_list/0,
   49:          invalid_inet_get_option_improper_list/1,
   50:          invalid_inet_set_option/0,
   51:          invalid_inet_set_option/1,
   52:          invalid_inet_set_option_not_list/0,
   53:          invalid_inet_set_option_not_list/1,
   54:          invalid_inet_set_option_improper_list/0,
   55:          invalid_inet_set_option_improper_list/1,
   56:          raw_inet_option/0,
   57:          raw_inet_option/1
   58:         ]).
   59: 
   60: %% Apply export
   61: -export([socket_options_result/5,
   62:          get_invalid_inet_option/1,
   63:          get_invalid_inet_option_not_list/1,
   64:          get_invalid_inet_option_improper_list/1,
   65:          set_invalid_inet_option/1,
   66:          set_invalid_inet_option_not_list/1,
   67:          set_invalid_inet_option_improper_list/1
   68:         ]).
   69: 
   70: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 5}).
   71: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   74: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   75: all() -> 
   76:     [
   77:     {group, tls},
   78:     {group, dtls}  
   79:     ].
   80: 
   81: groups() ->
   82:     [
   83:      {tls,[], socket_tests() ++ raw_inet_opt()},
   84:      {dtls,[], socket_tests()}
   85:     ].
   86: 
   87: socket_tests() ->
   88:     [
   89:      getstat,
   90:      socket_options,
   91:      invalid_inet_get_option,
   92:      invalid_inet_get_option_not_list,
   93:      invalid_inet_get_option_improper_list,
   94:      invalid_inet_set_option,
   95:      invalid_inet_set_option_not_list,
   96:      invalid_inet_set_option_improper_list
   97:     ].
   98: 
   99: raw_inet_opt() ->
  100:     [
  101:      raw_inet_option
  102:     ].
  103: 
  104: 
  105: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  106:     catch crypto:stop(),
  107:     try crypto:start() of
  108: 	ok ->
  109: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  110: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  111:     catch _:_ ->
  112: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  113:     end.
  114: 
  115: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  116:     ssl:stop(),
  117:     application:unload(ssl),
  118:     application:stop(crypto).
  119: 
  120: init_per_group(dtls, Config) ->    
  121:     [{protocol_opts, [{protocol, dtls}]} | proplists:delete(protocol_opts, Config)];
  122: init_per_group(tls, Config) ->    
  123:     [{protocol_opts, [{protocol, tls}]} | proplists:delete(protocol_opts, Config)];
  124: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->    
  125:     [{client_type, erlang},
  126:      {server_type, erlang} | Config].
  127: 
  128: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  129:     Config.
  130: 
  131: init_per_testcase(raw_inet_option, Config) ->
  132:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  133:     case os:type() of
  134:         {unix,linux} ->
  135:             Config;
  136:         _ ->
  137:             {skip, "Raw options are platform-specific"}
  138:     end;
  139: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  140:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  141:     Config.
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  144:     Config.
  145: 
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  148: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  149: 
  150: getstat() ->
  151:     [{doc,"Test API function getstat/2"}].
  152: 
  153: getstat(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  154:     ClientOpts = ?config(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  155:     ServerOpts = ?config(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  156:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  157:     Server1 =
  158:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  159:                                    {from, self()},
  160:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  161:                                    {options,  [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  162:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
  163:     Server2 =
  164:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  165:                                    {from, self()},
  166:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result, []}},
  167:                                    {options,  [{active, false} | ServerOpts]}]),
  168:     Port2 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server2),
  169:     {ok, ActiveC} = rpc:call(ClientNode, ssl, connect,
  170:                           [Hostname,Port1,[{active, once}|ClientOpts]]),
  171:     {ok, PassiveC} = rpc:call(ClientNode, ssl, connect,
  172:                           [Hostname,Port2,[{active, false}|ClientOpts]]),
  173: 
  174:     ?CT_LOG("Servers ~p, ~p ~n", [Server1, Server2]),
  175: 
  176:     %% We only check that the values are non-zero initially
  177:     %% (due to the handshake), and that sending more changes the values.
  178: 
  179:     %% Passive socket.
  180: 
  181:     {ok, InitialStats} = ssl:getstat(PassiveC),
  182:     ?CT_LOG("InitialStats  ~p~n", [InitialStats]),
  183:     [true] = lists:usort([0 =/= proplists:get_value(Name, InitialStats)
  184:         || Name <- [recv_cnt, recv_oct, recv_avg, recv_max, send_cnt, send_oct, send_avg, send_max]]),
  185: 
  186:     ok = ssl:send(PassiveC, "Hello world"),
  187:     wait_for_send(PassiveC),
  188:     {ok, SStats} = ssl:getstat(PassiveC, [send_cnt, send_oct]),
  189:     ?CT_LOG("SStats  ~p~n", [SStats]),
  190:     [true] = lists:usort([proplists:get_value(Name, SStats) =/= proplists:get_value(Name, InitialStats)
  191:         || Name <- [send_cnt, send_oct]]),
  192: 
  193:     %% Active socket.
  194: 
  195:     {ok, InitialAStats} = ssl:getstat(ActiveC),
  196:     ?CT_LOG("InitialAStats  ~p~n", [InitialAStats]),
  197:     [true] = lists:usort([0 =/= proplists:get_value(Name, InitialAStats)
  198:         || Name <- [recv_cnt, recv_oct, recv_avg, recv_max, send_cnt, send_oct, send_avg, send_max]]),
  199: 
  200:     _ = receive
  201:         {ssl, ActiveC, _} ->
  202:             ok
  203:     after
  204:         ?SLEEP ->
  205:             exit(timeout)
  206:     end,
  207: 
  208:     ok = ssl:send(ActiveC, "Hello world"),
  209:     wait_for_send(ActiveC),
  210:     {ok, ASStats} = ssl:getstat(ActiveC, [send_cnt, send_oct]),
  211:     ?CT_LOG("ASStats  ~p~n", [ASStats]),
  212:     [true] = lists:usort([proplists:get_value(Name, ASStats) =/= proplists:get_value(Name, InitialAStats)
  213:         || Name <- [send_cnt, send_oct]]),
  214: 
  215:     ok.
  216: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  217: socket_options() ->
  218:     [{doc,"Test API function getopts/2 and setopts/2"}].
  219: 
  220: socket_options(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  221:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  222:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  223:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  224:     Values = [{mode, list}, {active, true}],    
  225:     %% Shall be the reverse order of Values! 
  226:     Options = [active, mode],
  227:     
  228:     NewValues = [{mode, binary}, {active, once}],
  229:     %% Shall be the reverse order of NewValues! 
  230:     NewOptions = [active, mode],
  231:     
  232:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  233: 					{from, self()}, 
  234: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, socket_options_result, 
  235: 				  [Options, Values, NewOptions, NewValues]}},
  236: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  237:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  238:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  239: 					{host, Hostname},
  240: 			   {from, self()}, 
  241: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, socket_options_result, 
  242: 				  [Options, Values, NewOptions, NewValues]}},
  243: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  244:     
  245:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  246: 
  247:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  248:     
  249:     {ok, Listen} = ssl:listen(0, ServerOpts),
  250:     {ok,[{mode,list}]} = ssl:getopts(Listen, [mode]),
  251:     ok = ssl:setopts(Listen, [{mode, binary}]),
  252:     {ok,[{mode, binary}]} = ssl:getopts(Listen, [mode]),
  253:     {ok,[{recbuf, _}]} = ssl:getopts(Listen, [recbuf]),
  254:     ssl:close(Listen).
  255: 
  256: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  257: raw_inet_option() ->
  258:     [{doc,"Ensure that a single 'raw' option is passed to ssl:listen correctly."}].
  259: 
  260: raw_inet_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  261:     % 'raw' option values are platform-specific; these are the Linux values:
  262:     IpProtoTcp = 6,
  263:     % Use TCP_KEEPIDLE, because (e.g.) TCP_MAXSEG can't be read back reliably.
  264:     TcpKeepIdle = 4,
  265:     KeepAliveTimeSecs = 55,
  266:     LOptions = [{raw, IpProtoTcp, TcpKeepIdle, <<KeepAliveTimeSecs:32/native>>}],
  267:     {ok, LSocket} = ssl:listen(0, LOptions),
  268:     % Per http://www.erlang.org/doc/man/inet.html#getopts-2, we have to specify
  269:     % exactly which raw option we want, and the size of the buffer.
  270:     {ok, [{raw, IpProtoTcp, TcpKeepIdle, <<KeepAliveTimeSecs:32/native>>}]} = 
  271:         ssl:getopts(LSocket, [{raw, IpProtoTcp, TcpKeepIdle, 4}]).
  272: 
  273: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  274: 
  275: invalid_inet_get_option() ->
  276:     [{doc,"Test handling of invalid inet options in getopts"}].
  277: 
  278: invalid_inet_get_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  279:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  280:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  281:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  282:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  283: 					{from, self()},
  284: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, get_invalid_inet_option, []}},
  285: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  286:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  287:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  288: 					{host, Hostname},
  289: 			   {from, self()},
  290: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  291: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  292: 
  293:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  294: 
  295:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
  296:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  297:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  298: 
  299: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  300: invalid_inet_get_option_not_list() ->
  301:     [{doc,"Test handling of invalid type in getopts"}].
  302: 
  303: invalid_inet_get_option_not_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  304:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  305:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  306:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  307:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  308: 					{from, self()},
  309: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, get_invalid_inet_option_not_list, []}},
  310: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  311:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  312:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  313: 					{host, Hostname},
  314: 			   {from, self()},
  315: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  316: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  317: 
  318:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  319:     
  320:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
  321:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  322:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  323: 
  324: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  325: invalid_inet_get_option_improper_list() ->
  326:     [{doc,"Test handling of invalid type in getopts"}].

  348: 
  349: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  374: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  398: 
  399: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  400: invalid_inet_set_option_improper_list() ->
  401:     [{doc,"Test handling of invalid type in setopts"}].
  402: 
  403: invalid_inet_set_option_improper_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  405:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  406:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  407:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  408: 					{from, self()},
  409: 			   {mfa, {?MODULE, set_invalid_inet_option_improper_list, []}},
  410: 			   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  411:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  412:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  413: 					{host, Hostname},
  414: 			   {from, self()},
  415: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  416: 			   {options, ClientOpts}]),
  417: 
  418:     ?CT_LOG("Client ~p  Server ~p ~n", [Client, Server]),
  419: 
  420:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok),
  421:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  422:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  423: 
  424: 
  425: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  426: %% Callback functions ------------------------------------------------
  427: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  428: socket_options_result(Socket, Options, DefaultValues, NewOptions, NewValues) ->
  429:     %% Test get/set emulated opts
  430:     {ok, DefaultValues} = ssl:getopts(Socket, Options), 
  431:     ssl:setopts(Socket, NewValues),
  432:     {ok, NewValues} = ssl:getopts(Socket, NewOptions),
  433:     %% Test get/set inet opts
  434:     {ok,[{reuseaddr, _}]} = ssl:getopts(Socket, [reuseaddr]),  
  435:     {ok, All} = ssl:getopts(Socket, []),
  436:     ?CT_LOG("All opts ~p~n", [All]),
  437:     ok.
  438: 
  439: get_invalid_inet_option(Socket) ->
  440:     {error, {options, {socket_options, foo, _}}} = ssl:getopts(Socket, [foo]),
  441:     ok.
  442: 
  443: get_invalid_inet_option_not_list(Socket) ->
  444:     {error, {options, {socket_options, some_invalid_atom_here}}}
  445:      = ssl:getopts(Socket, some_invalid_atom_here),
  446:      ok.
  447: 
  448: get_invalid_inet_option_improper_list(Socket) ->
  449:     {error, {options, {socket_options, foo,_}}} = ssl:getopts(Socket, [packet | foo]),
  450:     ok.
  451: 
  452: set_invalid_inet_option(Socket) ->
  453:     {error, {options, {socket_options, {packet, foo}}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{packet, foo}]),
  454:     {error, {options, {socket_options, {header, foo}}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{header, foo}]),
  455:     {error, {options, {socket_options, {active, foo}}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, foo}]),
  456:     {error, {options, {socket_options, {mode, foo}}}}   = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{mode, foo}]),
  457:     ok.
  458: 
  459: set_invalid_inet_option_not_list(Socket) ->
  460:     {error, {options, {not_a_proplist, some_invalid_atom_here}}}
  461: 	= ssl:setopts(Socket, some_invalid_atom_here),
  462:     ok.
  463: 
  464: set_invalid_inet_option_improper_list(Socket) ->
  465:     {error, {options, {not_a_proplist, [{packet, 0} | {foo, 2}]}}} =
  466: 	ssl:setopts(Socket, [{packet, 0} | {foo, 2}]),
  467:     ok.
  468: 
  469: wait_for_send(Socket) ->
  470:     %% Make sure TLS process processed send message event
  471:     _ = ssl:connection_information(Socket).
  472:
